item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Angel Carlos, post:2, topic:524193”]IT really isn’t a hack, its just people like you don’t view the whole server files.

  1. Cheat Engine Shop possibility.
  2. Dupes.
  3. This is all on you, don’t blame it on them, since you didn’t take the time to check if their isn’t any glitches, dupes, etc…[/quote]
    Booms cheat client is technically a hack

OP:
Just add a UID server sided and client sided.

Read full topic
